task.title: Rearrange Data Visibilities
task.shortdesc: View configured data visibilities on the Data Visibilities screen of the System Configuration page.

context.p: Given that several versions of a field may be produced, your user authorities may entitle you to see more than one version of a field. You can stipulate which data visibilities should be preferred by arranging data visibilities in order of preference. If your user authority and the data's access policies entitle you to see more than one version of a field, the data with first-occurring visibility is given preference.
By default, visibilities are ordered by order of configuration. To set the order data visibilities:

step.cmd: Open the System Configuration page, by clicking the System Configuration icon in the left navigation bar.
step.info: The System Configuration page opens on the Password Policy screen.
The Data Visibilities screen opens, listing all the data visibilities configured for the system.

step.cmd: Click in the row you want to rearrange and drag it to the new location.
When you have finished rearranging visibilities, click the Save the New Arrangement button.
